H0.text: A Lemur is a small primate found only on which island. Borneo

H1.text: A Lemur is a small primate found only on which island. Sumatra

H2.text: A Lemur is a small primate found only on which island. Java

H3.text: A Lemur is a small primate found only on which island. Madgascar

A4.text: They are endemic to the island of Madagascar
